data.eml:eml: A new species of blunt-headed vine snake (Colubridae, Imantodes) from the Choco region of Ecuador

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Torres-Carvajal, Omar, Yanez-Munoz, Mario H., Quirola, Diego, Eric N. Smith,, Almendariz, Ana (2012): A new species of blunt-headed vine snake (Colubridae, Imantodes) from the Choco region of Ecuador. ZooKeys 244: 91-110, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.244.3950, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.244.3950
